css:
.print-format thead { background-color: green !important; color: white; border : 1px solid black; }
.print-format th { background-color: green !important; color: white; border : 1px solid black; }

html:
{% macro above_items() %}
SALES ORDER
{{ doc.customer_name }}
{{ doc.shipping_address }}
{{ doc.name }}
 {{ doc.transaction_date }}
Your PO Reference
{{ doc.po_no }}
Dear Sir/Madam,
Thank you for placing the purchase order. We hearby confirm our acceptance as follows:
{% endmacro %} {% macro below_items() %}
Sr Product Unit Qty Order
Total Quantity {{ "%.2f"|format(doc.total_qty|float) }}
Store Incharge:

Authorised Signatory:
Signature:

Signature:
{% endmacro %} {{ above_items() }} {% set pr = [1] %} {% set lines = [0] %} {%- for row in doc.items -%} {% if lines[-1] %} {% endif %} {% if lines.append( lines[-1] + 2 +((row.description|length / 38)|int)) %}{% endif %} {% if (row.description|length % 38) > 0 %} {% if lines[-1] %} {% endif %} {% if lines.append( lines[-1] + 1 ) %}{% endif %} {% endif %} {% if (lines[-1]/30) <= pr[-1] %} {{ row.idx }} {{ row.item_name }}
{{ row.serial_no }} {{ row.uom }} {{ row.qty }} {{ row.purchase_order }} {% else %} {{ below_items() }}
{% if pr[-1] %} {% endif %} {% if pr.append( pr[-1] + 1 ) %}{% endif %} {{ above_items() }} {{ row.idx }} {{ row.item_name }}
{{ row.serial_no }} {{ row.uom }} {{ row.qty }} {{ row.against_sales_order }} {% endif %} {%- endfor -%} {{ below_items() }}
name: AMOET Purchase Invoice
